title: The Virgin Sex Queen
description: Two weeks of lust and laughter…Sophie Willow - erotic romance writer, experienced, the ultimate Sex Queen. Unfortunately, it’s all in her head - the experienced part, that is.Alan Cooper - this cute cop has discovered her secret, and he reckons he’s just the man to give her the experience she needs.Will two weeks be enough, or will it leave them wanting more?
author: Angela Verdenius
